content: I'm glad you're considering packing multipurpose items. I actually learned the importance of packing light when I went on a weekend getaway with friends and made a conscious effort to pack light. I managed to fit everything into a carry-on, which made traveling so much easier. I realized that I don't need to bring everything with me, and that multipurpose items can really help reduce luggage space. Can you give me some more tips on how to pack clothing items, like dresses or shirts, that can be easily mixed and matched?
